tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  LECTURE HEAVY  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: This professor is lecture heavy and I was an education major until I walked in her class. Lectures are heavy, get ready to read and write because you\'ll be tested daily in class through clickers and her midterm is over 8 chapters and her final is over 16. I was a walking textbook in her class and it made me hate education.

tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: This class was horrible. I was a walking textbook. Midterm is over the first 8 chapters and then the final is over 16 chapters. Made me hate education and I switched my major.

tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Took her for speech and language acquisition. Its a lot of information because she only has two exams to cover it. Shes really funny and helpful, overall an easy A

tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
stu_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES  TEST HEAVY  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: She has one midterm and a final. The final is over 12 chapters and only 100 multiple choice questions so its hard to pass. I have loved speech pathology for years and her class made me hate the material. Does not teach, only has you copy notes every single class. Also quizzes over material you havent learned. If you can get another prof, do it.

tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Dr. Burgess is a good professor. Study your notes, come to class, and read the book- you\'ll do fine

tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: I loved Dr Burgess. I took her for Speech and Language Development. She made me love the class because she made it interesting. The book and class notes went right hand in hand which made it easy to study for the exams. She is my favorite just because of how genuine she is.

tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: I felt I learned a lot in her class. She gave open book online tests for middterm and final. She put a lot of time into preparing for this class. It was a huge class but she put us in groups that we sat with and worked with all semester. As an aspiring teacher I find myself analyzing professor\'s teaching ability and I felt she was really good.

tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
Participation matters (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: Class size HUGE. Prob 150 ppl so we\'re split into groups to wk together. Have to have clicker 4 quizzes every class. 2 wiki posts a week. 2 group papers. 1 volunteer act. 2 online tests.Lots of busy wk but easy, even group papers easy. lots of days no class 2 watch videos. Felt like waste of time mostly.just get it done. show up w laptop. trust me!

tag_professor: Participation matters (2)  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Get ready to read (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)  TEST HEAVY (1)
comments: She\'s really nice and knows a lot. She\'s willing to modify classes to fit student needs. Very helpful and not too hard; but you learn everything you need. Very good prof. Don\'t worry about long classes; she gives breaks. Looks just like Ellen Degeneres...
